page.title: 19 MORTLAKE RESIDENTS
page.content: The elderly people like it in Mortlake because it is very quiet and friendly, but they have one main problem - some of the houses are damp and they need modernising. We found that on average people had been living here for 40-45 years. The middle-aged people thought there is a good variety of schools and places to take young children; they dislike the noises of planes and the smell of petrol fumes. The main problem seems to be the high price of things, and lack of parking spaces. The average time they had been residents here was 9-12 years. The under-16s think this are is full of activities and their main dislike the dog litter.
